title: Moto X Style and new Moto 360 now available to pre-order in U.K.
content:
Motorola’s new Moto X Style and second-generation Moto 360 are now up for pre-order in the U.K. directly through the company’s online store. Moto X Style, which is one of two Moto X handsets that were announced by Motorola…  
Motorola’s new Moto X Style and second-generation Moto 360 are now up for pre-order in the U.K. directly through the company’s online store. 

Moto X Style, which is one of two Moto X handsets that were announced by Motorola this summer, starts at £399 (approx. $616). For that, you get a 5.7-inch Quad HD display, a hexa-core Snapdragon 808 processor, 3GB of RAM, and a 3,000mAh battery. 

Moto X Style also packs Motorola’s new 21-megapixel rear-facing camera, which is claimed to be one of the best smartphone camera sensors to hit the market this year. 

As standard, the Moto X Style comes with 32GB of storage and a plastic back. However, you can upgrade to 64GB of storage and add more premium wood and leather finishes through Moto Maker for an extra £35 (approx. $54) and £20 (approx. $31) respectively. 

The new Moto 360 starts at £229 (approx. $353) for the 42mm “designed for men” and “designed for women” options, while the larger 46mm model is priced at £269 (approx. $415). These prices apply to the standard models with a leather strap.
